sect1.title: Object tree tab
sect1.para:
Object tree tab
In this tab you can specify what items will be visible in the object treeview.
sect1.sect2: Document dictionary This option toggle showing of main document dictionary (called "document catalog") in tree.
Object dictionaries This option toggle showing of dictionaries of various objects (like pages) in tree.
Graphic objects This option toggle showing of graphic objects in tree.
Annotations This option toggle showing of outlines in tree.
Pages This option toggle showing of outlines in tree.
Outlines This option toggle showing of outlines in tree.
Content streams This option toggle showing of content streams in tree.
Simple objects This option toggle showing of simple objects (int,bool,real,string,name) in tree.
Sort dictionary items alphabetically This specify whether items in dictionaries should be sorted alphabetically (checked) or in order they appear in PDF file (unchecked)
